RelatedSentence: The Minister of Trade and Industry , Usman Boie Kamara , while officially cutting the tape , states that his Ministry will continue to maximize support to encourage private investment and will continue to encourage people to invest  in the country , and as a Ministry they will ensure such investment does not go in vein , adding that Samsung should try to implement the Local Content Policy in their operations as a way of creating employment for Sierra Leoneans and also using the local product in making their products .
